column2: Shaya ari muchipatara
column3: naMilcah Nhakura SHASHA yakambonetsa ichitamba nhabvu, George ‘Mastermind’ Shaya, anoti anogamuchira zvakaitika kwaari zvekudamburwa gumbo rake rekurudyi zvichitevera kunetseka kwaakange aita nechirwere chepasi petsoka chinozivikanwa nekuti ganrene.   Achitaura neKwayedza svondo rino ari muchipatara cheParirenyatwa Group of Hospitals, muHarare, Shaya anoti anoisa zvose mumawoko aMwari.   “Muhupenyu hwedu chinenge chaitika tinofanirwa kuzvitambira. Mwari variko uye hatizvirambe.   “Munhu unofanirwa kugara wakagadzirira zvese zvese muhupenyu zvinogona kuitika,” anodaro.   Paakashanyirwa neKwayedza, Shaya aive ane mudzimai wake – Agnes Shaya – uyo anoti murume wake akange atambudzwa zvikuru nechirwere chaive pagumbo rake apo raingopera nekudyika kubva nekutsoka.   “Baba vange varwadziwa hama, gumbo rakavashungurudza iri saka tiri kutozviona kuti zvakange zviri nani kuti vari bviswe pane kurwadziwa kwavakange vachiita vainaro gumbo racho.   “Iye zvino tinoona kuti vasununguka manje, havacharwadziwe vave kunzwa zvakanaka pane zvavakange vari kunzwa. Isu semhuri tave kungotambira zvakaitika.   “Asi hatidi kunyepa zvakatirwadza nekuti gumbo racho ndiro ravaitamba naro nhabvu, vachiita zvidavado zvavo,” anodaro Agnes.   Anoti murume wake haasi kuzomusiya ari ega uye achamira naye achimubatsira pane zvese zvaanenge achida.   “Mumwe wangu uyu ini ndini ndinomubikira uye kumuwachira, ndicharamba ndakamira naye ndichiona kuti akagara zvakanaka here nekuti panguva ino tinofanirwa kuramba takamira tese.   “Zvakaitika izvi tinongozviisa mumawoko aMwari. Asi vachibuda muno vanofanirwa kuenda kuRehab centre kuti vambonogara vachitariswa nekuti vakangonanga kumba vanogona kunozvikuvadza rimwe gumbo racho,” anodaro Agnes.   Shaya mumwe wevatambi venhabvu vakaita mukurumbira uye munhorondo yemutambo uyu ndiye ega akakwanisa kuhwina mubairo weSoccer Star of the Year kashanu.   Zvakadai, imwe shasha yakambonetsa ichitamba nhabvu kuzvikwata zvinoti Dynamos FC nemaWarriors, David ‘Yogi’ Mandigora – uyo akadamburwawo gumbo rake muna 2017 nekuda kwedenda regomarara – anoti munhu anofanirwa kugamuchira zvose zvinoitika muhupenyu hwake.   “Muhupenyu munhu anofanirwa kugara akagadzirira zvese nekuti hatizive kuti mangwana unomuka uripi. Zvese zvese zvinogona kuitika uye usingafungire.   “Kana zvaitika sezvandakasangana nazvo zvekugurwa gumbo izvi wotongozvitambira nekuti ndizvo zvinenge zvavepo panguva yacho,” anodaro Yogi.   Anoti achazoshanyira Shaya kumba kwake kana achinge abuda muchipatara.   PIX: George Shaya   Caption: George Shaya aine mudzimai wake Agnes Shaya kuchipatara cheParirenyatwa Group of Hospitals nemusi weChipiri svondo rino.

column2: Vamwe Vokurudzira Kuti VaMnangagwa Vabvume Kuti Hurumende Yavo Yakundikana
column3: Mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika nezveupfumi haachina kugadzikana izvo zvave kupa kuti vamwe vakurudzire kuti hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa nebato ravo reZanu PF vabvume kuti vakundikana kufambisa nyika. Mitengo yezvinhu inonzi iri kuramba ichiita chamurambamhuru zuva nezuva, mari hadzisi kuwanikwa nyore, zvitoro nemakambani zviri kuvhara zuva nezuva, nyika haina mafuta ekufambisa nezvimwe zvinodiwa pazuva nevanhu. Ukuwo, hurumende inonzi iri kuramba ichikwereta mari kunze senzira yekuedza kugadzirisa dambudziko iri. VeZanu PF vari kuramba kutambira kuti ndivo vari kukonzera matambudziko ari munyika aya, vachinongedza minwe kune vanopikisa, avo vavari kuti ndivo vari kuomesa zvinhu vachida kuti vanhu vapandukire hurumende. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vanoti chiri kuita kuti zvinhu zviome munyika kushaikwa kwehunyanzvi kune vanotungamira makambani ari munyika, izvo zviri kuzokonzera kuti zvinhu zviparare munyaya dzezveupfumi. Asi nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vachitungamira sangano revarairidzi rePTUZ uye vari nhengo yeMDC, Doctor Takavafira Zhou vanoti vanhu havafanirwe kurova imbwa vakaviga mupinyi vachiti VaMnangagwa nehurumende yavo ndivo vakundikana kufambisa basa. Doctor Zhou vanotiwo chikuru chinofanirwa kuitwa ndechekuti muhurumende muve nekudhonza pamwechete, kwete zvakaratidzwa neveZanu PF avo vakabuda vachiti vakanga vasina kunzwikwa pfungwa dzavo negurukota rezveupfumi, VaMthuli Ncube pavakaburitsa hurongwa hwavo hwemari. No media source currently available

column2: Bhajeti reKanzuru yeMasvingo Rinoramba Kutambirwa neVagari Vakawanda
column3:
Vagari vemuguta reMasvingo vari kuramba kutambira bhajeti rekanzuru yavo regore rinouya remadhora mabhiriyoni mana vachiti rakakurisa zvikuru uye vagari vazhinji vachatadza kubhadhara mitero nekuda kwekuoma kwakaita hupenyu munyika.

Vachitaura neStudio 7 mushure mekuitwa misangano yekunzwa dzevanhu pabhajeti iri, vagari ava vanoti ivo zvikamu mazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvishanu kubva muzana zviri kuda kukwidzwa mitero zvakakurisa sezvo vanhu vakawanda vachatadza kubhadhara mitero iyi. Mumwe mugari, Amai Beatrice Hamdziripi, vemumusha we Runyararo West, vanoti ivo kukwidzwa kwemitero uku kunomesera vagari vazhinji avo vasiri kuwedzerwa mari kwavanoshanda nekudaro vanozonetseka kubhadara mari idzi kana dzikakwidzwa nekanzuru.

Mumwe mugari, VaHardlife Tangayi wekuHillside, vanoti zvakaoma kuti kanzuru iwedzere mitero nezvikamu zvakadaro panguva iyo ruzhinji rwevagari rwuri kuvharirwa mvura nekutadza kubhadhara mari iri kudiwa izvozvi, nekudaro gore rinouya dhorobha rose rinogona kuzotadza kubhadhara mvura kana mitero iyi ikakwidzwa.

Gore rino vagari vazhinji vari kubhadhara mari yemvura iri pakati pezviuru
zvitatu nezviuru zvitanhatu zvemadhora pamwedzi. Mari iyi ikakwidzwa gore rinouya, vagari vanenge vobhara mari inotangira pazviuru zvisere nemazana masere ane makumi mashanu emadhora kusvika pazviuru gumi nezvinomwe nemazana manomwe emadhora emaRTGS. Meya weguta reMasvingo, VaCollen Maboke, vanoti kanzuru yakatarisa
zvinhu zvakawanda isati yakwidza mitero iyi, zvinosanganisira kukwira
kwemafuta emotokari dzebasa nemitengo yemishonga yekuchenesa mvura iyo inotengwa kunze kwenyika nemari yekunze.

Asi sangano rinomirira vagari reMasvingo United Residents and Rate
Payers Alliance (MURRA) rinoti kunyange zvinhu zvakakwidzwa mitengo semafuta edzimotokari chikamu chekanzuru chakangokurisa uye vagari vazhinji kwavanowana mari haina kukwidzwa nezvikamu zvakadaro. Anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muMURRA, Muzvare Rumbidzai
Magurupira, vanoti kanzuru iri kuda kusiya mugari ari parumananzombe.

Vamwe vagari vanoti zve chinonyanya kuvarwadza ndechekuti
vanokwidzirwa mari asi mvura yacho ichinetsa kuuya mudzimba dzavo. Mvura inouya kwemaawa mashoma shoma makuseni oga oga yobva yaenda voswera vasina mvura izvo zvinozoita kuti vashandise zvibhorani zviri mumawadhi asi panouya mapepa emvura, mitengo inenge yakakwira zvikuru. No media source currently available

column2: Vanozvibatira Mabasa eMaoko Votambira neMufaro Kuvhurwa kweNzvimbo dzeKutengesera muHarare
column3: Kanzuru yeguta reHarare inoti boka revanorarama nekuzviitira mabasa emaoko ravhurwa zvakare muguta iri asi pachiteverwa zvakasimba mitemo yezvehutano yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Kanzuru yazivisa nezvekuvhurwa kwemusika weCopacabana Traders Mall, uko vachange vachitengesera mumusika uyu vachange vachibhadhara madhora mashanu emari yekuAmerica pazuva. Kanzuru yazivisawo kuti musika mukuru weMbare wave pedyo nekuvhurwa zvichitevera kuvandudzwa kwawanga uchiitwa kuti ufambirane nenyaya dzekuchengetedzwa kwehutsanana. Vanorarama nekutengesa vanoti vanotambira nemufaro kuvhurwa zvakare kwenzvimbo dzekutengesera uku vachiti vazhinji vavo vanga vave kunonga svosve nemuromo kubva pakadzikwa mutemo unorambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Mukuru wesangano reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vanoti vanotambira danho iri nemufaro asi vanofunga kuti madhora mashanu ari kunzi vanhu vabhadhare pazuva imari yakawandisa. Asi mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vaudza Studio 7 kuti musika weCopacabana Traders’ mall hausi pasi pekanzuru yeHarare izvo zvinoita kuti vasave nechekuita nekutarwa kwemari dzinobhadharwa nevanhu pazuva. Vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru weSurvival Vendors Union of Zimbabwe, VaObey Mwariwangu, vatiwo sesangano vanotambira danho rekuvhurwa zvakare kwemisika iri, asi vanoona sekunge mitemo yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19 yakanyanya kuomera vanhu. VaMwariwanguu vanoti vanotengesa ava ndivo vachange vachitarisirwa kutenga voga mishonga inouraya hutachiwana pamwe nema face mask, izvo vanoti zvinogna kudhurira vakawanda. Hatina kukwanisa kubata varidzi veCopacabana Mall kuti tinzwewo divi ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

column2: Dzimwe Mhuri Dzowana Raramo neKugadzira Zvinodzivirira Covid-19
column3: Panguva apo vakawanda vari kusiya mabasa vamwe vachienda kumamisha nekuda kwekuvhingidzwa nechirwere cheCOVID-19, dzimwe mhuri dziri kuwana raramo yakanaka nekugadzira mamasiki ayo dzinotengesa. Mumwe mugari wekuSunningdale muHarare, Baba Edson Masoramuvari kugadzira pamwe chete nemudzimai wavo mamasiki avari kutengesera kumakambani pamwe neveruzhinji. Baba Musora, avo vane makore makumi matanhatu nemasere ekuberekwa, vanoti kosi yavakaita yekusona yakavavhurira mukana pakatanga kuvharirwa vanhu mudzimba nekuda kwechirwere cheCOVID-19. Lockdown yauya hatina kusvika pakuitwa lockdown nepfungwa zvese. Takatanga kugadzira ma washable masks taona kuti acho ari kugadzira ari kutengeswa achingoraswa mubhini. VaMasora, avo vane vana vanomwe vanoti bhizimusi ravo riri kufamba zvakanaka nekuda kwemamasiki avo anomhanyirwa neveruzhinji nekuda kwemagadziro akanaka avanoaita pamwe nemutengo wakachipa. Takawana contract yema 100 masks ku Joiner City. Nzira dzekuti zvinhu zvedu zvimhanye ndezvekutsvaga ma orders kubva kuma kambani. Ndizvo zvinoita kuti zvinhu zvedu zvifambe. Mudzimai wavo, Amai Jennifer Masora, vanoti dambudziko ravari kuona nderekuti mamasiki ane ngozi pahutano hwevanhu vane huchapa uye vachifarira akagadzirwa nemicheka ine mavara matema. Ma mask akanaka anotidzivirira COVID asi dambudziko randiri kuona pane vakawanda nderekuti havasati vakuita hutsanana. Unonyatsotarisa oona kuti mask iyi yaane mazuva haizivi kuwachwa. Ndiro dambudziko randiri kuona. Amai Masora vanoti kushingairira pane zvavari kuita kwayambutsa vakawanda. Iye zvino murairidzi chaiye ndinotomukunda kuita mari, kunyanya iyo nguva ino yakaoma kudai. Vese vari mumahofisi ndinovakunda kurarama. Handiende mu queue ku bhanga kunotora mari. Munhu anouya nejira rake ndomusonera, oenda ku bank ouya ondipa mari. Mumwe mudzimai ari kurarama nekutengesa mamaisiki, Amai Naomi Chinhaire, vanoti zvekuzarirwa mumba ne lockdown zvakavapa mazano avakanga vasingambofungiri. Ndinoshandisa ma tailors ekumakambani mahombe vanondipa pfungwa dzekugadzira zvinhu zvakakodzera zvekuti kana uri kunze uku zvinhu zvako zvinotengwa zvakanaka. Ndinoshandisa pattern nyowani yekuti munhu anotenga asingagunun’une. Amai Chinhaire vanoti mhuri yavo yatove neraramo inodarika yavaive nayo kutanga kwegore rino. Handidi kunyepa, zvinhu zvangu zviri kufamba. Dzimwe nguva ndinobuda mumba kuma seven kuseni ndoenda pandinongomira. Panguva diki diki zvinhu zvangu zvinenge zvapera. Pamwe ndinobuda ndine ma masks anosvika 50 asi ndinodzoka ese apera. VaTitus Doyce vanofarira zvigadzirwa zvemamasiki Amai Chinhaire. Ma mask aya tinoada nekuti unonyatsofema zvakanaka, uye kana uri pane vanhu vanenge vachingokubvunza kuti wakaiwana kupi. Kana wakaburitsa mari unofanira kugutsikana nechinhu chaunenge watenga. Pasi pemutemo weZimbabwe munhu wese anofanira kufamba akapfeka masiki kumeso kwake kana ari pane veruzhinji, senzira yekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere cheCovid-19. Sangano rehutano pasi rese reWorld Health Organisation rinoti mamasiki chinhu chinofanira kugara chakashambidzika uye haifaniri kuchinjanwa. No media source currently available

column2: ‘Covid-19 yaondonga mutambo wenetball’
column3: MUTAMBI wenetball wechikwata chenyika chemaGems  Felistas Kwangwa — uyo anove kaputeni — anoti coronavirus yakamisa zvinhu zvakawanda muhupenyu hwake sezvo mutambo uyu uriwo unomuraramisa.   Kwangwa vazhinji vanomuziva ari mumwe wevatambi akatamba netball yainwisa mvura apo maGems akaenda kunokwikwidza kumakwikwi eVitality World Cup Liverpool 2019.   Achidzoka kubva kumutambo uyu, akasvika achitsiva Perpetual Siyachitema ndokugadzwa kuve kaputeni wechikwata ichi.   Kwangwa anoti kusawana mukana wekutamba mutambo uyu unomuraramisa iye pamwe nevatambi vakasiyana, kuri kurwadza uye kudzosera hupenyu hwavo kumashure.   “Zvinhu hazvina hazvo kumira zvakanaka, hatina kumbozvifungidzira kuti coronavirus ndizvo zvaichaita izvi.   Hatina kukanganiswa isu tega, asi pasi rese riri kuchema nechirwere ichi,” anodaro.   Mwedzi uno chikwata chemaGems chaifanirwa kunge chaenda kunokwikwidza kune mumwe mutambo kunyika yeRepublic of Wales asi wakamiswa nekuda kweCovid-19.   “Mwedzi uno tange tichifanirwa kunge taenda kuWales kunokwikwidza kune mumwe mutambo asi zvese zvakaenda mudondo.   Tave kungomirira pachapera coronavirus tozoona kuti tozvifambisa sei.   “Asi iye zvino tiri kuita gadziriro dzedu tiri kudzimba sezvo takangonzi tigare takagadzirira nehutungamiri hwedu nekuti tinogona kunotamba bhora kana ‘lockdown’ ikapera. Ndofunga pane zviri kurongwa,” anodaro Kwangwa.   Parizvino Kwangwa ari kugara kuZvishavane uko anoshanda.   “Ndiri kuZvishavane izvezvi, ndine vamwe vatambi vemaGems vatatu saka tinoita tichimbobatana tichiita gadziriro dzedu pamwechete.   “Vamwe vari kunzvimbo dzakasiyana munyika tinokurukura paWhatsApp tichitumirana mavhidhiyo uye tichirakidzana kugadzirira kwatinenge tichiita,” anodaro Kwangwa.

column2: Mapurisa neVasori Vogara Vakadzipakatira Sezvo Kugunun'una neHurumende yaVaMugabe Kwowedzera
column3: Hurumende inonzi yati vanochengetedza mukati menyika vagare vakadzipakatira kana kuti "high alert" sezvo zvinhu munyika zvaita manyama amire nerongo. Vamwe vakuru mumapurisa vataura neStudio 7 vati zvinhu hazvina kugadzikana munyika nenyaya yekusamira zvakanka munyaya dzezvehupfumi asi vati vakagadzirira kuona kuti hakuna kuratidzira kuchaitika. Vanhu vakawanda kusanganisa vechidiki, mapato ezvematongerwo enyika, vana muzvinabhizimisi uye vemachechi vave kubuda pachena kuti havasi kufara nezviri kuitwa nehurumende yemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Mapurisa anodzivirira mvongamupopoto akawanda ave kuendeswa kumadhorobha akawanda sezvo kuratidzira kwakatangira muHarare Nemusi weChishanu vesangano revechidiki richangoumbwa rinonzi veTajamuka iro rine vechidiki kubva kumasagano ezvematongerwo enyika akasiyana siyana, vadzidzi nevemamwe masangano rakendesa tsamba yenyunyuto kumahofisi eInternational Monetary Fund muHarare uko vanonzi vakasvika kwakazara vesangano revasori avo vakatanga kuvatevera. Tsamba yakasiiwa iyi yaikurudzira IMF kuti isadyidzane nehurumende yaVaMugabe yyavanotio iri kutyora kodzero dzevanhu nekuita zvehuwori. KuMasvingo mapurisa anonzi akaramba kupa mvumo kuvemachechi nevamwe, vemasangano akazvimirira nevezvematongerwo enyika vange vachida kuratidzira vachiti havasi kufara nehutongi hwaVaMugabe. Officer commanding Masvingo Superitendent Philip Ncube vaKAudza vanhu ava kuti havasi kuzotenderwa kuratiudzira pasi pemutemo wePublic Order and Security Act kana kuti POSA. Nemusi weChina vamwe vechidiki veTajamuka vakarohwa zvakaipisisa nemapurisa mushure mekuratidzira muHarare. Vamwe vairatidzira muAfrica Unity Square mavhjiki apera vakambosungwa ndokuendeswa kuChikurubi neHarare Remand asi vakazobuda nemusi weChishanu muhure mekunge vabhadhara mari yechibatiso. Vana muzvinabhizimisi vane chitsama vari kunzi vari kubvunzurudzwa nemapurisa kana vachinge vangotaura kuti nyika yaenda kumawere. Bato guru rinopikisa reMDC-T riri kuratidzirawo mumadhorobha akasiyana siyana. Mubato riri kutonga reZanu-PF maberekerawo pongwe sezvo paine kunetsana kwakanyanya kuti ndiyani achatora chigaro chaVaMugabe avo vave nemakore makumi mapfumbamwe nemaviri asi pasina kujeka kuti achatora chigaro chavo ndiyani kana vasiya basa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika Vajoy mabenge vanoshanda nesangano recrisis in zimbabwe coalition vajoy mabenge. No media source currently available

column2: Nyakupfura VaPatrick Kombayi Muna 1990, VaChivamba, Vanoshaya
column3: Mutevedzeri wasachigaro weZanu-PF mudunhu reMidlands Province, VaKizito Chivamba, avo vange vari nhengo yeparamende inomirira Chiwundura, vakashaya kuchipatara cheGweru nemusi weChitatu. VaChivamba vakatanga kuva nhengo yeZanu muna 1972 uye vanoti vainge vari mujibha kubva muna 1977 kusvika muna 1979. Vange vari nhengo yeparamende kubva muna 2008. Mufi anonzi ange arwara kwenguva yakareba. Kunyange hazvo veZanu-PF mudunhu iri vari kuchema vachiti vaive gamba, vamwe vanopikisa vanoti nyaya yavo yekupfura muchakabvu Patrick Kombayi vachibatsirana naVaElias Kanengoni musori, avo vakaitwa gamba renyika munongedzo wekuti muZimbabwe hamuna hutongo hwejekerere. Muna 1990 munguva yesarudzo, VaChivamba naVaKanengoni vakapfura VaKombayi vainge vari kubato reZimbabwe Unity Movement. VaKombayi vaikwikwidzana nevaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika mushakabvu Simon Muzenda kuGweru. Dare repamusoro soro rakavatongera kugara mujeri kwemakore manomwe asi mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakabva vavaregerera vachishandisa masimba avo semutungamiri wenyika. Munguva yehondo yeChimurenga, VaKombayi vaibatsira zvikuru varwiri verusununguko vainge vari kuZambia. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaDewa Mavhinga, avo vanoshanda nesangano reHuman Rights Watch, vanoti tsika yehurumende yeZanu-PF yekuregerera vanotyora kodzero dzevanhu iri kudzosera hutongo hwejekerere kumashure. No media source currently available

column2: Zifa inokara mari: Shereni
column3: SHASHA yakambonetsa ichitambira nhabvu maWarriors, Dynamos nezvimwe zvikwata zvekuEurope — Harlington Shereni — anoti vakambotamba mutambo uyu vanovharirwa kunze pose pavanoda kuita zvirongwa zvekusimudzira nhabvu nesangano reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) iro raanoti rizere nevanhu vane makaro emari.   Shereni mumwe wevakatamba nhabvu yepamusoro izvo zvakamuona achitambira kuEurope kwemakore akawanda kuzvikwata zvinosanganisira SR Delemont yekuSwitzerland kozoti Istres, Guingamp, Nantes neStrausborg zvekuFrance.   Muchinda uyu aive muchikwata chemaWarriors chekutanga kuenda kunokwikwidza kuAfrica Cup of Nations kuTunisia.   “Isu sevakambotamba nhabvu kare tine rudo rwekusimudzira mutambo uyu asi tinopedzisira tasvika pakuneta nekuti hutungamiri hwenhabvu yemuno vanokupedza simba. Havana rudo nenhabvu asi chavanongoda imari chete, kunyangwe pakauuya vatsva vanoshanda semashandiro aiita vanenge vabva.   “Kuti zvinake, panodiwa munhu akatamba nhabvu yepamusoro kwete munhu wese wese,” anodaro Shereni.   Parizvino Zifa iri kutungamirirwa naFelton Kamambo uyo akambotamba nhabvu kuchikwata cheMhangura Football Club.   Asi, mumaonero aShereni anoti chigaro ichi chinoda munhu akatamba nhabvu yepamusoro-soro.   “Ndofunga yasvika nguva yekuti isu takambotamba nhabvu tikwikwidze musarudzo idzi dzekusarudza mutungamiri weZifa   “Uye munhu anofanirwa kunge akaona nekutamba nhabvu yepamusoro kuti aunze shanduko munhabvu yemuno,” anodaro.   Shereni — uyo akaberekerwa ndokukurira kuChiredzi —  anoti anoda kusimudzira mutambo wenhabvu kuChiredzi.   “Ndiri kushanda kuti ndisimudzire nhabvu kuChiredzi kwandakabva uye kutanga gore rinotevera tichange tichiita mitambo yakasiyana tichibika tarenda revatambi vari kusimukira. Tiri kutsvaga vanokwanisa kukotsvera kuti basa iri ritange,” anodaro Shereni.   Mutauriri weZifa Xolisani Gwesela anoti havasati vakamboona chinyorwa chinobva kunaShereni chekuti anoda kusimudzira mutambo wenhabvu muno.   “Hatisati tamboona kana zvaakambonyora achiti anogona kushandura nhabvu muno saka zvaari kutaura zviri kubvepi? Mari ipi iri kudyiwa?   “Nhabvu yakavhurika kumunhu wese uye tinotambira pfungwa dzevamwe idzo dzinoshandura nhabvu  zvichiita kuti ikure,” anodaro Gwesela.   Anoenderera achiti, “Hapana akambomurambidza kuti akwikwidze musarudzo dzekusarudza hutungamiri hweZifa uye kana achiona kuti anogona kutungamira akasununguka kukwikwidza musarudzo dzinotevera, asi hunge kana achizadzikisa zvinodiwa zvinotarisirwa kuti ukwikwidze musarudzo dzeZifa.”

column2: Vanorarama neKutengesa Vonyunyuta neKusiiwawo muHurongwa Hwemari yeKubatsira veMabhizimusi
column3: Sangano Vendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, kana kuti VISET, rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru nemashoko egurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube ekuti mari yekubatsira vemabhizimi munguva yekurwisa denda reCovid-19 yakaiswa parutivi nehurumende inosvika mabhiririyo gumi nemasere kana kuti 18 billion RTGS haisi kuzopihwa vanozviitira mabasa emaoko. VaChitaura mudare reparamende svondo rapera, VaNcube vakati mari iyi ichakwereteswa vemabhizimisi makuru kuburikidza nemabhanga uye RBZ iri kuisa mari yechibatiso inosvika zvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana. VISET inoti vemabhizimi madiki nevanozviitira mabasa emaoko vari kudawo rubatsiro sezvo vari kutatarika kumutsiridza mabhizimisi avo akanganiswawo nechirwere cheCovid-19. Mukuru weVISET VaSamuel Wadzayi vanotiwo hurumende inokwanisa kushanda nemakanzuru kugadziridza misika yekuti vakwanise kushanda vakasungunuka. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaNcube sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. No media source currently available

column2: Chevrons, Ireland zvotatsurana
column3: CHIKWATA chenyika checricket chemaChevrons, svondo rino chiri kubandana neIreland mumitambo yeOne Day International.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi svondo radarika zvakatamba mitambo yeTwenty20 International Series iyo yakahwinwa nemaChevrons 2-1.   Mumitambo yeT20, maChevrons akahwina wekutanga, Ireland ndokuzohwina wechipiri uye maChevrons akahwina wechitatu uyo wakaaona achisimudza mukombe weT20.   Svondo rino, zvikwata izvi zviri kutatsurana mumitambo yeODI kunhandare yeHarare Sports Club. Mutambo wekutanga uri kutambwa nemusi weChitatu, wechipiri nemusi weMugovera uye wekupedzisira nemusi weMuvhuro (23 Ndira).   MaChevrons anotofanira kukunya dzisimbe kuti akunde mumutambo weODI uyu obva ahwina series yese inoti yeT20 neODI.   Achipedza kubandana neIreland, maChevrons haasi kumbozorora sezvo ari kubva atanga gadziriro dzekusangana neWest Indies mwedzi unotevera mumitambo miviri yetest match kuQueens Sports Club kuBulawayo.   Director wecricket kuZimbabwe Cricket (ZC) — Hamilton Masakadza — anoti nguva yange yareba chikwata chavo chisina kumbotamba mitambo yetest match.   Anoti vakagadzirira kusangana neWest Indies uye chikwata chavo chinoda kuhwina mutambo uyu.   “Tine mufaro kukuzivisai kuti tichashanyirwa neWest Indies iyo yatichatamba nayo mitambo miviri yetest match kuBulawayo.   “Kunyangwe hazvo nguva yange yareba tisina kumbotamba mitambo yetest match, vakomana vedu vachange vaine hukasha vakagadzirira kutamba mitambo iyi. Ndinovimba kuti mumwe mutambo mukuru nechimwe chikwata chikuru uri kurongwa,” anodaro Masakadza.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi zvakapedzisira kusangana mumitambo yetest match series mugore ra2017 iyo yakapera iri mangange.   Asi, mutambo wakazopihwa West Indies kuti yahwina sezvo yainge yakakunda mutambo wekutanga ne117 runs.   MaChevrons akapedzisira kutamba mutambo wetest match mugore ra2021 apo akasangana neBangladesh muHarare.

column2: Kubviswa kweLockdown Kuchanetsa Sezvo Vanhu Vakawanda Vasati Vaongororwa Covid-19
column3: Sangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights rinoti danho rekuwedzera kana kusawedzera mazuva ekuti nyika irambe yakavharwa, richanetsa kutora sezvo vanhu vazhinji munyika vasina kuongororwa kuti vane chirwere cheCovid-19 here kana kuti kwete. Izvi zvinoitika apo hurumende ichiti yave kutora matanho matsva ekuti vanhu vakawanda vaongororwe, zvikuru vari munzvimbo dzine vanhu vakabatwa neCovid-19. MuZimbabwe mava nevanhu makumi maviri nevatatu vabatwa nechirwere ichi, uye vanhu vatatu vafa nacho, asi pasi rose riine vanhu vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvinomwe vafa neCovid-19 kubva zvayakatanga kuChina gore rapera. Munyori musangano iri, Doctor Norman Matara, vaudza Studio7 ruzhinji rwevanhu munyika harwuna kuongororwa kuti rwune chirwere cheCovid-19 here kana kuti kwete panguva iyo nyika yakavharwa kwemazuva makumi maviri nerimwe akatarwa nemutungamiri wenyika zvichaita kuti hurumende itemeseke musoro kuti nyika yoramba yakavharwa here kana kuti kwete pachapera nguva yakatarwa naVaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Pari zvino, bazi rezvehutano rinoti raongorora vanhu mazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nevashanu chetekuti vane chirwere ichi here kana kuti Havana munyika ine vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi nematanhatu. Nekuda kweizvi, VaMatara vati zvinonetsa kuti hurumende itore danho rine hudzamu isina humbowo hwakati tsvikiti hwekuti zvinhu zvakamira sei munyika pamusoro pechirwere ichi. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMDC, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vanoti huwandu hwevanhu vaongororwa kusvika pari zvino hunoratidza kuti kuvharwa kwakaitwa nyika hakuna chakwabatsira. Mutauriri wesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vakurudzirawo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuti vambomira kufamba-famba kwavari kuita. Asi VaMnangagwa vanoti vari pakati pahurongwa hwekutenderera nenyika yose vachiona mamiriro akaita zvinhu pamusoro pechirwere cheCovid-19 ichi uye kuona kuti veruzhinji vari kutevedzera here kurudziro yavo yekuti veruzhinji vagare kudzimba senzira yekuderedza kuapararira kwechirwere ichi. VaMnangagwa vakazivisa kutivachazoongorora pakupera kwemazuva makumi maviri nerimwe avakatara kuti veruzhinji vange vari kudzimba senzira yekuderedza mikana yekupararira kwechirwere ichi kuti zvinokodzera here kuti veruzhinji varambe vari mudzimba kana kuti kwete. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rezvehutano, VaObediah Moyo, sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi munyori mubazi ravo, Doctor Agnes Mahomva, vaburitsa mashoko ekuti komiti yakaumbwa nemutungamiri wenyika kuti itungamire nyaya dzekurwisa chirwere che Coronavirus yeInter-Ministerial Taskforce on Covid-19 inotungamirwa nemumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika, VaKembo Mohadi, yakabvumirana kuti patorwe matanho akasimba ekuti vanhu vazhinji munyika vaongororwe kuti havana chirwere cheCvoid-19 here. Gwaro raburitswa naDoctor Mahomva iri rinoti vanhu vese vanga vachienda kumabasa panguva iyo nyika yanga yakavharwa, kunyanya vashandi vehurumende, vachaongororwa kuti havana kutapukirwa nechirwere ichi here. Doctor Mahomva vati munhu wese anofungidzirwa kuti ane chirwere ichi anosungirwa kuongororwa, uye vose vari kupinda munyika vachibva kunyika dzine chirwere ichi pamwe nevane zvirwere zvedzihwa vanofanira kuongororwa zvakare. Doctor Mahomva vatiwo vanhu vakwegura vane makore makumi matanhatu zvichikwira vari muzvipatara vane zvirwere zvakaita se asthma, shuga, BP, nezvirwere zvemoyo vanofanirawo kuongororwa zvakare. Vati zvose izvi zvichaitwa kuti hurumende inyatsoziva kuti nyika yakamira papi chaizvo pachirwere cheCovid-19. Pari zvino, chirwere cheCovid-19, icho chakatangira kuChina, chinonzi nehurumende chauraya vanhu vatatu munyika, uye kubata vanhu gumi nevasere, ukuwo pasi rose, vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni maviri vabatwa neCovid-19, uye vanhu vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvonomwe, vafa nechirwere ichi pasi rose. No media source currently available

column2: Varume Vari Kupomerwa Mhosva yeKuuraya Musoja kuChivhu Vanonzi Vapfurwa Vakafa neMauto neMapurisa
column3: Varume vaviri vakapfura masoja maviri mumwe wacho akafa muChivhu nezuro\nvapfurwa vakafa nhasi kuNyazvidzi pedyo nekuBuhera. Nunurai Jena\nanotipa nyaya inotevera. Vaviri ava, avo vasati vave kuzivikanwa mazita avo vapfurwa nemasoja achibatsirana nemapurisa. Mutauriri wemapurisa Asst Comm Paul Nyathi vabvuma kuti vaviri ava vapfurwa vose vakafa uye pfuti dzavakatora dzawanikwa vachinadzo. Masoja maviri aya akapfurwa pane imwe kamba yemapurisa diki pedyo neChicken Inn kuChivhu. Kamba yemapurisa iyi ine mauto nemapurisa ari kubatsirana kuona kuti vanhu vatevedzera here kurudziro yekuti vagare mudzimba senzira yekutevedzera mitemo yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. VaNyathi vanoti munhu akapfura mauto aya akapinda pakamba apa ndokukumbira mumwe muuto kuti vataura panze ndokuzodzoka mukamba vose achibva apfura nekuuraya mumwe muuto mumwe akakuvara zvakaipisisa asati atiza nemumwe wake. Kupfurwa kwemasoja uku kuri kuuya apo hukama hwevanhu nemasoja husina kumira zvakanaka nekuda kwekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kuri kupomerwa mamwe masoja munyika. Makore maviri apera mugore ra2018 muna Nyamavhuvhu vanhu vatanhatu vakapfurwa vakafa nevanofungidzirwa kuti masoja vachiratidzira asi hapana musoja akasungwa kunyange pakaitwa ongororo yaitungamirwa nevaive mutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaKgalema Mothlanthe. Asi vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vakawanda vataura neStudio 7 vati kunyangwe vanhu vakanetsana hapafanire kudeurwa ropa sezvo paine matare anofanira kutonga nyaya dzose. Gweta uye vari mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu VaDzikamai Bere vanoti hukama hwevanhu nemasoja hauna kunaka zvachose vachiti hukama uhu hunofanirwa kugadziriswa kuti vanhu vakwanise kuyamura mapurisa nemasoja mubasa ravo. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reMDC Alliance VaClifford Hlatswayo vanoti masoja, mapurisa nevanhu vanofanirwa kuremekedzana kuti nyika ifambire mberi zvakanaka. Mamwe magweta ataura neStudio 7 ati kufa kwevanhu vakuraya muuto uku kuchapa kuti nyika isazive kuti chii chaizvo chakapa kuti padeuke ropa asi vachiti zvinonetsa kubata vanhu vanenge vachipomerwa mhosva yekuuraya uye vaine pfuti. Vanhu nemasoja vakamboita hukama hwakasimba apo masoja akabatsira kupidigura vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika mushakabvu Robert Mugabe. Asi vamwe vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vanoti masoja haafanire kupindira munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika sezvinokurudzirwa nebumbiro remitemo. Nezure wakare vamwe vanhu vakaonekwa vakatakura nekumhanyisa muuto ainge akuvara kuchipatara.

column2: Hurumende Yoomerwa Sezvo Hupfumi Huri Kuparara
column3: Apo vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kuyaura nhenhamo, zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichioma uye hurumende iri kuramba ichiomerwa zvekuti yave kutadza kuita basa rayo pamwe nekutadza kubhadhara shandi vayo. Hurumende iyo inowana mari yekushandisa kubva kumitero yakasiyana siyana yakaita semutero unowanikwa pakutengeswa kwezvinhu, Value Added Tax, mitero yemakambani, Corporate Tax, pamwe neyavashandi kana kuti Paye As You Earn, inoti mari iri kuwanikwa nehurumende iri kuramba ichidzikira. No media source currently available Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti hapana tariro yekuti zvinhu zvichanaka munguva pfuti inotevera. Mumashoko avo emashandisirwo akaitwa mari nehurumende kusvika pakati pegore rino, gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakati mari inowanikwa pamitero iyi yakadzikira zvakanyanya. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaNyasha Muchichwa, vanoti mari iyi kusanganisira PAYE icharamba ichidzikira sezvo makambani ari kuramba achivhara vashandi vachidzingwa mabasa. Nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzehupfumi, hurumende inotarisirwa kunge yave kutadza kubhadhara vashandi vayo pakupera kwegore rino. VaMasimba Manyanya, avo vakamboshanda mubazi rezvemari mumakore ekuma 1990s, vanoti izvi ndizvo zvinoitika kana hurumende ikatadza kuvandudza hupfumi munyika. VaManyanya vanoti zvinhu zvinogona kusamira zvakanaka mukati menguva pfupi inotevera. Vamwewo vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaJames Johwa, vanoti matanho mazhinji ari kutorwa nehurumende mukuedza kugadzirisa hupfumi haasi kushanda uye chave kudiwa kuti vari kutonga vabude pachena kuti vatadza kuitira kuti vanhu vemunyika nemapato nemasangano akasiyana siyana ashandire pamwe mukusimudzira hupfumi. Pari zvino hurumende yakaremerwa zvekuti pane mashoko asina kutsinhirwa ekuti iri kutopona nekutora mari kubva kune mamwe makambani ayo kuti ikwanise kuita basa rayo. Sachigaro wekambani ye Mbada Diamonds inove mubatanidzwa wehurumende neimwe kambani yekuSouth Africa, VaRobert Mhlanga, vakaudza paramende gore rapfuura kuti kambani yavo yakambosvika pane imwe nguva yekuti yaipa hurumende mamiriyoni makumi matatu emdhora pasvondo kuti ibhadhare vashandi vayo. Asi VaManyanya vanoti kunyange hazvo hurumende yange ichitora mari kumakambani emangoda nemamwe, zvinhu zvave kuoma kwese uye ichasara isisina kwekuenda. Pari zvino, hurumende iri kushandisa zvikamu makumi masere nezvitatu zvemari yese yebhajeti mukubhadhara vashandi izvi zvinoita kuti isare isina mari yekushandisa muzvipatara, zvikoro pamwe nemamwe mabasa. Semuenzaniso gore rapfuura, bazi rezvemari rakapa zvipatara zvese munyika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nematatu emadhora yekushandisa gore rese asi zvipatara izvi zvaive nechikwereti chemamiriyoni makumi matatu nematanhatu emdhora zvinoreva kuti mari yese yakaenda kunobhadhara zvikwereti. Makambani akawanda munyika kusanganisira ehurumende haasi kubhadhara mitero iyo inove nzira inowana hurumende nayo mari. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehufpumi dzinoti hurumende inofanira kusimbisa kubhadharwa kwemitero kuti iwane mari yekushandisa. Semuenzaniso gwaro raAuditor- General rinoti makambani ehurumende ange aine zvikwereti zvemutero zvemazana mashanu emamiriyoni emadhora gore rapfuura. VaChinamasa vanoti vakapa simba rekutevera mari dzese dzemutero dzisina kubhadharwa uyevo vanoti hurumende ichabata mitero pane mari dzimwe dzinowanikwa nevashandi vemakambani neakazvimirira kuti mari dzekubatsirikana dzibatirwe mitero. Asi VaMuchichwa vanoti hapana chinobuda nekuti vanhu havana chivimbo nemashandisirwo ari kuitwa mari nehurumende ndosaka kana makambani anokwanisa asiri kubhadhara mitero. Kunze kwemitero, nyika inokwanisa kukwereta kana kuwana rubatsiro kubva kunyika kana masangano ekunze. Asi VaManyanya vanoti izvi hazvikwanisike pari zvino nekuti hurumende iri kutadza kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo uye hukama hwayo nenyika zhinji dzinopa rubatsiro dzakaita seAmerica neBritain hauna kumira zvakanaka. Zimbabwe haisiwo kuwana rubatsiro kubva ku World Bank ne International Monetary Fund sezvo iri kukundikana kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo zvinodarika mabhiriyoni gumi emadhora Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi pamwe nezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti kana hupfumi hwenyika hukadonha, zvinhu zvinogona kushata munyika zvinogona kukonzera kuti sarudzo dziitwe nguva yadzo isati yasvika muna 2018. Zimbabwe National Statistics Agency inoti vanhu vanodarika makumi matanhatu munyika varombo uye zvikamu makumi manomwe kubva muzana zveavo vachiri pamabasa vanotambira mari iri pasi pemadhora mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu emadhora pamwedzi. Kumatunhu akaita seMatabeleland North, kune hurombo hunotyisa zvekuti vanhu vanodarika makumi masere kubva muzana kunzvimbo iyi vari kuyaura nenhamo.

column2: Vana Chiremba Vanopinda Muzuva Repiri Vachiramwa Mabasa
column3: Vana chiremba vapinda neChina muzuva repiri rekuramwa mabasa. Vana chiremba avo vanoti pamusangano wavaita nebazi rezveutano, hurumende yavimbisa kutambira chinyunyuto chimwe chete chete. Vachitaura neStudio7, mutungamiri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctor’s Association, Dr Edgar Munatsi, vati nhengo dzavo zhinji hadzisi pabasa sezvo vakamirira kuti zvichemo zvavo zvigadziriswe nehurumende. VaMunatsivati vanotorwadziwa zvikuru sanachiremba kuti hupenyu hwevanhu huri parumananzombe nekuda kwekuramwa mabasa kwavo uku. Vakurudzira hurumende kuti ikurumidze kugadzirisa zvinyunyuto zvavo. VaMunatsi vatinhengo dzavo dziri kutyityidzirwa nevamwe vakuru vemuzvipatara asi vati mumusangano wavaita nehurumende nhasi, vavimbiswa kuti kuita kwakadai kuchamiswa. Vana chiremba vanoti pahurukuro dzavaita nhasi nehurumende, hurumende yavimbisa kugadzirisa chinyunyuto chimwechete chekuvawanisa mabasa kana vapedza zvidzodzo zvavo zvepamusoro. Pari zvino hurumende yange ichibatirira kuzvitupa zvana chiremba ava kwegore kunyange hazvo hurumende yange isingavapi mabasa. Mubati wehomwe musangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctor’s Association, VaInnocent Zano, vati chinangwa chavo ndechekuti hurumende igadzirise zvinyunyuto zvavo zvese, vonyorerana pasi kuti vadzokere kubasa. Pashanyirwa chipatara cheParirenyatwa, vana chiremba vange vakatogara zvavo vachitaura nyaya nguva dzebasa. Studio 7 yatadza kutaura nevarwere sezvo kwange kuchidiwa tsamba kubva kubazi rezveutano . Asi VaBrian Paradza, avo vashanyira hama yavo kuParirenyatwa vakurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise dambudzo iri vakati murwere wavo kubva nezuro haasati awonekwa nachiremba. Bazi rezvautano rabudisa gwaro rekukurudzira vana chiremba kuti vadzokere kumabasa apo zvichemo zvavo zvinenge zvichigadziriswa. Asi MDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai yaburitsa mashoko ichiti haisi kufara nezviri kuitwa nehurumende yeZanu PF iyo iri kuvhiringa hutano hwenyika yese nekutadza kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavana chiremba. No media source currently available

column2: Iran Inorwisa Mizinda Inogara Mauto eAmerica muIraq
column3: Iran yakakanda zvombo zvema ’missiles’ zvinopfuura gumi nezviviri kumizinda inogara mauto eAmerica mu Iraq neChipiri manheru. Asi hazvisati zvazivikanwa kana paine mauto aurayiwa kana akuvadzwa. Iran inoti yaita izvi senzira yekutsiva kuurayiwa neAmerica kwakaitwa General Qassem Soleimani svondo rapera. Muzinda mukuru wemauto eAmerica, we Pentagon, pamwe chete nemuzinda wemutungamiri wenyika, weWhite House, yazivisa kuti haisi kuzotaura pamusoro penyaya iyi nevatori venhau sezvo mutungamiri wenyika, VaDonald Trump, vachataura kune veruzhinji.. VaTrump Asi vanyora paTwitter pavo kuti zvinhu zvese zvakanaka, vachiti vachataura kuvanhu pamusoro pezvenyaya iyi nemusi weChitatu. Nhengo yeZanu PF muWashington DC, VaFrenk Guni, avo vari kutevera kufamba kuri kuita nyaya iyi nguva dzese, vanoti America inofanira kuziva kuti kana ikatanga hondo neIran, inofanira kuziva kuti hondo yacho haiperi sezvatiri kuona muIraq neAfghanistan. No media source currently available

column2: Kusaenda kuMabasa kwaVanachiremba Kwoomesera Varwere Zvakanyanya
column3: Hupenyu hwevarwere hworamba huri munjodzi sezvo vana chiremba vari kuramba vakashinga nerekuti havazi kuzodzokera kumabasa kusvika hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo.\n\nPasvika Studio 7 pachipatara chikuru chemuBulawayo cheMpilo Central nhasi mangwanani vanhu vashoma vange vari kuzvikamu zvinorapwa varwere vanenge vachibva kumba, kwange kuchibatsirwa navana mukoti vachiri kudzidzira basa. Mumawadhi mange muine varwere vashoma vange vachionekwawo navana mukoti. Mumwe murwere anorarama nehurema, VaMalcolm Ndlovu, vati vave nevhiki vachirwara nemudumbu uye vange vauya kuti vazoonekwa navana chiremba asi vanzi vadzokere kumba sezvo vanachiremba vange vasiri pabasa. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kumukuru wavana chiremba paMpilo Central, Doctor Solwayo Ngwenya, sezvo vange vachinzi vari mumusangano. Asi Doctor Mthabisi Bhebhe, vanove munyori weMpilo Doctors Association, vati vanachiremba vepachipatara ichi pamwe nevekuUnited Bulawayo Hospitals uye munyika mose, havazi kuzodzokera kubasa kusvikira hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Doctor Bhebhe, avo vakambovewo mutauriri wesangano ravanachiremba vemuzvipatara zvehurumende reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, vatiwo pari zvino hurumende haisati yaita zvinobatika pakugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Pakuti zvinhu zvakamira sei muzvipatara kana kwakatariswa varwere, Doctor Bhebhe vati havakwanise kuziva sezvo vasiri kuenda kubasa, asi vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti hurumende igadzirise zvichemo zvavo nekukasika kuti vakwanise kudzokera kubasa vabatsire varwere. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Kuramwa mabasa kwavana chiremba kwasvika muzuva rechimakumi maviri nemanomwe. Mune imwewo nyaya, kanzuru yeguta reBulawayo inoti iri kushushikana nekuti vagari vari kuramba vachishandisa mvura yakawanda izvo zvinogona kuzosiya madhamu anopa mvura muguta iri asisina mvura. Vachitaura neStudio 7 mushure memusangano nevagari pamusoro pemamiriro akaita zvinhu muguta panyaya dzemvura, munyori wekanzuru, VaChristopher Dube, vakurudzira kuti vagari vashandise mvura zvine mwero. Guta reBulawayo rinowana mvura kubva kumadhamu matanhatu anosanganisira Inyankuni, Lower Ncema, Upper Ncema, pamwe neUmzingwane, uye kwasara zvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzana zvemvura mumadhamu ari kushanda pari zvino. Dhamhu reUpper Ncema rakatomiswa kushandiswa pari zvino nekuda kwekushomeka kwemvura uye kanzuru inoti Umzingwane rinogona kumiswawo munguva pfupi inotevera. Panyaya yekuwedzerwa kwemari inoshandiswa nekanzuru kana kuti supplementary budget yakaparurwa nekanzuru svondo rapera, VaDube vatsanangura kuti bhajeti iyi ichashanda chete kana yapasiswa nehurumende. Pabhajeti iyi kanzuru inoti inoda kukwidza mitero nezvikamu zvinosvika mazana matatu kubva muzana uye vamwe vagari vari kutsutsumwa kuti mari iyi yakawandisa. No media source currently available

column2: WC yakandivhura mhanza: Perpetual
column3: KAPUTENI wechikwata chenyika chenetball chemaGems, Perpetual Siyachitema, anoti zvekutamba mutambo uyu zviri muropa uye kuenda kwavakaita kunokwikwidza kuWorld Cup yakaitirwa kuLiverpool, kuEngland nguva yadarika kwakavavhurira mikana yakasiyana.   MaGems akanyora nhorowondo kuve chikwata chekutanga kubva muZimbabwe kuenda kunokwikwidza kuWorld Cup uko chikwata ichi chakanotamba zvinodakadza.   “Hakuna zvimwe zvikwata zvevarume zvemuno zvakamboenda kuWorld Cup sesu asi ndinoti kuburikidza nekuenda kwatakaita kumakwishu aya kwakativhurira mukana uye netball yave kutsigirwa.   “Kubva ndakatanga kutambira maGems mugore ra2009, ndaingoshuvira kutambira netball kumakwishu makuru uye ndakazokwanisa kuzviita. Kumutambo uku ndaiziva kuti kwaizouya shasha kubva kuzvikwata zvakasiyana, kunyanya zvekuAustralia kuzonditarisa ndichitamba,” anodaro Siyachitema.   Siyachitema akazvarwa mugore ra1983 kuChitungwiza uko kwaakakurira.    Akadzidza kuzvikoro zvinoti Tasimukira Primary School, Seke 5 High neSeke 3 High.   Anoti achiri kuchikoro, ndipo paakatanga kutamba netball achitevera matsimba amai vake nemukoma wake avo vakambotambawo mutambo uyu.   Shasha iyi yakazvarirwa mumhuri yevatambi vemitambo yakasiyana sezvo baba vake – Fanuel Siyachitema – vaimbove mutambi wenhabvu ane mukurumbira kunyika yeZambia.    Amai vake nemukoma wake vese vaitamba netball muNetball Super League.   “Ndakazvarirwa mumhuri yevatambi vemitambo yakasiyana, baba vangu vaive mutambi wenhabvu ane mukurumbira kuZambia kozoti amai uye mukoma wangu vese vakatamba netball muSuper League.   “Vabereki vangu vaitoti ramba uchiita zvemitambo nekuti zvichazokupa pundutso uye ndiri kutozviona zvichitoitika iye zvino,” anodaro.   Anoti mwanasikana wake – Gugulethu – uyo ane makore 16 ekuberekwa, ari kutambawo netball pamwechete nebasketball.   “Mwanasikana wangu anotambawo netball nebasketball saka ndinofara chaizvo kuti tine zvatinofarira pamwechete.   “Iniwo ndichikura ndaimbotamba basketball panguva yandaitamba netball asi ndakazosiya basketball nekuti netball ine zvakawanda zvakayakanakira sezvo une mukana wekuzopinda basa.   “Tiri kumba, ndinoshanda nemwana wangu ndichimubatsira zvakasiyana zvemutambo uyu, ndinoda chaizvo kuti azosvike kure mumutambo uyu,” anodaro.   Shasha iyi yakwanisa kutambira zvikwata zvinosanganisira Matiza Queens, Honde Queens, Telecel Queens, ZRP PPU, Gathsmine, Trojan Mine Bindura, Railstars Bulawayo, ZPC Hanngwe uye parizvino ari kutambira pamwe nekurairidza Glow Petroleum Queens.   Siyachitema anoti murume wake ndiye chiremba wake uye anomutsigira zvikuru mumutambo uyu.   “Murume wangu haadi neni, ndiye chiremba wangu anombondibatsira kana ndakuvara. Anonditsigira zvikuru kunyangwe hazvo ndichipedza nguva ndefu ndisipo ndichifamba nemutambo uyu,” anodaro Siyachitema.

column2: Hurumende Inonzi Haisati Yapindura Magwaro Akakwidzwa Mudare rePamusoro naVana Chiremba
column3: Gurukota rinoona nezvehutano, Dr David Parirenyatwa, nemunyori mukuru mubazi ravo, Dr Gerald Gwinji, vanonzi havasati vapindura magwaro ari kudare repamusoro akaendeswa navanachiremba vachiti danho ravakatora rekuvabvisira mari dzemihoro mushure mekuratidzira rainge risiri pamutemo. Kuratidzira uku kwakapfuura mavhiki maviri uye kwakatanga muna Gumiguru kukazopera muna Mbudzi. Vanachiremba vainge vakanda mapadza pasi vachiti havasi kufara nemari dzavaitambiriswa uye kushaya zvikwanisiro zvekushandisa. Sangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association rinoti vanachiremba vakabatirwa mari dzinopfuura mazana mashanu emadhora. Gweta ravanachiremba ava, VaEmmanuel Samundombe, vanoti zvakaitwa nehurumende zvekubvisira vanachiremba mari kutyora bumbiro remitemo. No media source currently available Asi hurumende mutsamba yakanyorwa naDr Gwinji yakaudza vanachiremba ava kuti kuratidzira kwavo kwainge kusiri pamutemo nekudaro vaizobatirwa mari sezvinoitirwa vanenge vaenda havo pazororo risiri pamutemo. Hurumende yave nemakore ichinetsana navanachiremba nenyaya yemari dzavanotambira asi dambudziko iri harisi kupera.

column2: World Bank Inoti Kuda Kutanga Bhizimisi muZimbabwe Kuchiri Kunetsa
column3: Gwaro reWorld Bank rinoratidza mamiriro ezvinhu munyika dzepasi rose panyaya dzekuita bhizimisi munyika idzi rinoratidza kuti Zimbabwe ichiri pachinhano chepasi, zvisinei nechinangwa chehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa chekuda kuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika pamwe nemaitirwo ebhizimisi munyika. Mugwaro iri, iro rinonzi “Doing business” regore ra2019, Zimbabwe iri pachinhano chezana nemakumi mashanu neshanu. Mugore rino ra2018 Zimbabwe yange iri pachinhano chezana nemakumi mashanu nepfumbamwe. Chipangamazano musangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe Doctor Propser Chitambara avo vanovewo nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vanoti dambudziko guru panyaya yekuvandudza hupfumi pamwe nemaitirwo ebhizimisi munyika inyaya yekuti hurumende inotaura zvinhu zvaisingaite. Mauritius iyo iri pachinhano chemakumi maviri ndiyo nyika iri pachinhano chepamusoro-soro panyika dzemuAfrica ichiteverwa neRwanda iyo iri pachinhano chemakumi maviri nepfumbamwe. Panyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica South Africa iri pachinhano chemakumi masere nepiri (82) Botswana iri pachinhano chemakumi masere netanhatu (86). Zambia iri pachinzvimbo chemakumi masere nenomwe (87) kozotiwo Namibia iri pachinzvimbo chezana nenomwe (107). Gwaro iri rinotarisa zvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana kusanganisira kuti zvinotora nguva yakareba sei kuti munhu akwanise kutanga bhizimisi, zviri nyore here kuwana magetsi, nezvimwe zvakadaro. VaReginald Shoko vanove mukuru wesangano reAffirmative Action mudunhu reMatabeleland vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kutora muenzaniso wenyika yeRwanda iyo yakabvisa mitemo yakawanda pakuvhura mabhizimisi munyika iyi. VaButler Tambo muongorori wezve budiriro anoshanda akazvimirira vanoti rimwe dambudziko guru rinokanganisa kuvandudzwa kwehupfumi pamwe nekuitwa kwebhizimisi munyika inyaya yemitemo isina kujeka. VaTambo vanotiwo nyaya yekuti muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi iri kupa kuti hurumende ingovimbisa zvaisiri kukwanisa kuita. Vati hurumende inofanira kuzvipira kurwisa huori uho huri kukanganisa nyaya yebudiriro kana kukwezva vanoda kutanga mabhizimisi. VaChitambara vanobvumiranawo nemaonero aya. Mugwaro ra2019 nyika yeDjibouti ndeimwe yenyika dzakasimukira zvikuru kubva pachinhano chezana nemakumi mashanu neina kusvika pachinhano chemakumi mapfumbamwe nepfumbamwe. Gwaro iri rinoti nyika iyi yakkwanisa kuita izvi nekuvandudza mitemo yayo kusanganisira kuita kuti vanhu vakwanise kunyoresa mabhizimisi avo munguva pfupi. Bhanga reWorld Bank rinoburitsa gwaro re”Doing Business” gore rega rega. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi, asi ivo nemutungangamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa pasi pedingidzira ravo rekuti Zimbabwe Yakavhura Magonhi ekuita bhizimisi kana kuti "Zimbabwe Is Open for Business" vanotaura nyaya yekurerutsa kuita mabhizimisi munyika sechinhu chavanonyanya kukoshesa.
